thread.title: 'Terror attack' in Istanbul: 35 dead, 40 others wounded in nightclub shooting
thread.title_full: 'Terror attack' in Istanbul: 35 dead, 40 others wounded in nightclub shooting

author: Associated Press
title: 'Terror attack' in Istanbul: 35 dead, 40 others wounded in nightclub shooting
text: An assailant believed to have been dressed in a Santa Claus costume opened fire at a nightclub in Istanbul during New Year's celebrations Saturday, killing at least 35 people and wounding 40 others in what the city's governor described as a terror attack.
